name: Minor Adjustments
description:
Minor Adjustments is a mildly overscoped (Sorry for lack of polish! It's 4am!) submission to Wowie Jam 4.0! A bullet hell where you control shooting and moving, but an AI decides what minor adjustments to give (lol). Fight through 2 stages with a(n anti-)climactic boss fight to end it!

Contains bugs, because it's 4AM and we overscoped. I'm tired.

CONTROLS:
W/A/S/D - Move

MOUSE / LEFT CLICK - Shoot

MINOR ADJUSTMENTS:

Reload - Has priority when on low ammo. Guaranteed if out of ammo.

Heal - Has priority when low health if your kill meter is full.

Grenade - If the AI thinks you're pointing at a spot it would be good for.

Parry Shield - Has priority when health is low.

Switch weapons - Has priority if you are close/far from an enemy with a pistol/shotgun
